main.name: Michael Ibragimchayev
main.description: A product-driven customer leader with Fortune 500 SaaS deployment experience.
main.bio: My name is Michael Ibragimchayev. I currently work at AppsFlyer, a mobile attribution and marketing analytics company headquartered out of Israel. Iâ€™m from New York City and am currently based here as well. I spent a very short year living in San Francisco, CA during my time at my previous company Datorama, acquired by Salesforce in 2018.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

work.title: Strategic CSM && OneLink Product Specialist
work.description: AppsFlyer is the world's leading mobile attribution & marketing analytics platform, helping app marketers around the world make better decisions.

work.title: Solutions Architect
work.description: Datorama is AI-powered marketing intelligence. Make smarter decisions by connecting and acting on all of your marketing data, investments, and KPIs.

projects.title: Gotham
projects.category: Gotham is a static site generator that is extremely fast, efficient, and modular.

projects.title: yURL
projects.category: yURL is a CLI (Command-Line Interface) and webapp that allows you to validate whether a URL is properly configured.

projects.title: OdinLink
projects.category: A OneLink API utility. Written in Go.

projects.title: BetterQuestions
projects.category: Built with ReactJS and GoogleSheets as a DB

testimonials.text: Michael is an intelligent, dedicated, and empathetic leader. He possesses the deep technical expertise and combines that with top-notch interpersonal and communication skills to drive a positive impact on product and revenue initiatives.

Working with Michael has been a thrilling experience. Michael has a special talent of effortlessly connecting with and influencing those around him. It's rare to find someone who can combine this ability with Michael's technical expertise and creativity.
